body:
Hello everyone! We're going to have another PlugDJ Event on New Year's Eve! No set genre, just bring you're favorite music of the past year. Please no inappropriate or offensive music/videos. Many of you probably have other New Years festivities to get to, so this event will be a little bit earlier, at 5:30pm EST.

If you don't know what PlugDJ is, it's a virtual club where you can make playlists and share them with other people. You can make an account by going over to Avicus' PlugDJ follow the instructions there.

Hope to see you there!
